snippet: The Dow Jones industrial average ended with a gain of 0.4 percent, continuing last week’s rally.
abstract: Stock market rises modestly, lifting Dow Jones industrial average to its fifth straight nominal record high.
lead_paragraph: The Dow Jones industrial average ended with a gain of 0.4 percent, continuing last week’s rally.

headline.main: Market Rally Continues, Though Volume Is Light
headline.print_headline: Market Rally Continues, Though Volume Is Light
